page.title: 17Shopping in Viewpark area
page.content: A few modern shops have been built in Viewpark recently but most are small general stores. Some are run by Pakistanis. Market Square has a few food shops, a post office and a hard- ware store. Butchers and bakers go round the streets in vans. Most people leave to do their shopping in Bellshill (2.5 miles) or Uddingston (2 miles). An Uddings- ton survey in 1979 said 13% of its shoppers came from Viewpark. Udd- ingston's shops are nearly all on its main street. We spoke to two housewives who said they only bought bread, milk and newspapers in Viewpark. Sometimes they would go to the market for clothing. Mostly they went to Bellshill or Glasgow.
